title: Jacket
description: black with neck band of raised embroidery with sequins on silk teal; same embroidery on bottom edge; broad cotton band of geometric design in purple/blue on blue; vents narrow black purple bands; sleve cuff black silk with inset band in blue, purple; pounded indigo
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
